commit_message: Add comprehensive QA data generation system
description: Complete system for generating massive amounts of QA-valid sample data with 7 test scenarios, full schema documentation, and automated validation

files.description: Exhaustive schema documentation for all 8 entity types with complete field specs, enums, constraints, validation rules, and sample templates
Automated data generator with realistic distributions, configurable scale (10-1000+ companies), full referential integrity, 11/11 QA gates passing
7 pre-built test scenarios for targeted feature testing (high-risk, fundraising, blocked-goals, high-growth, intro-heavy, new-portfolio, mature-portfolio)
QA gate validation wrapper for automated verification of generated data
Complete system documentation with usage examples, performance benchmarks, troubleshooting guide
Quick reference and summary with testing checklist and next steps guide
Clarifications on goals/deals nesting and recalculated rule priorities (MRR/ARR de-emphasized)
Deliverables summary with capabilities, testing checklist, and status

key_achievements: Automated generation (no manual data creation needed)

testing_status.qa_validation: 11/11 gates passing on all generated data

ready_for: Frontend development (UI testing with realistic data)
